answers.answer: I've heard very bad things about taking castor oil to help u go into labor. It can give U constant diarrhea, it can also make the baby poop in the amnio fluid-which is very very bad for baby. Just keep walking, squats, have some1 massage Ur feet along the sides of shines/around the knobby ankle bone. Talk to Ur dr again at every apt hopefully u dr will induce U. Also lookup online & post on the older age group forums. I've just heard really bad side effects from using castor oil.
Have you tried evening primrose oil?
Go to Wal-Mart in the vitamin isle and get evening primrose gel capsules and insert them vaginaly

question: I'm 39 weeks baby's measuring 40 and a half  weeks and I'm so miserable I can't stand it anymore I've got mild preeclampsia not bad enough to be induced my lower back is swelled my legs are goin numb my hips are popping in and out of place and my legs an feet so swelled...my dr refuses to induce me..I've tried everything walking bouncing on a ball dancing moving furniture around (not lifting) cleaned done squats and absolutely nothing....I'm to the point of trying castor oil. NO BASHING!!! I just need advice. My body can't take much more.
title: Castor oil??
